name: Black Ark Fleetmaster

abilities.name: Murderous Swashbuckler
abilities.description: If you roll a 6 for the attack roll when using the Murder Hook, you can immediately make up to 3 Black Ark Cutlass actions against the same adversary (if they are still alive) without having to spend a hero dice.

abilities.name: Sea Dragon Cloak
abilities.description: You can re-roll failed save rolls for the Fleetmaster against Missile attacks.

renown: If you inflict 5 or more wounds during your turn, gain 1 renown.
